lime_survey:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

We are constantly trying to improve customer experience. That's why we would like 5 minutes of your time to complete this survey. Would be great if you could complete the survey at the earliest.

TAKE SURVEY NOW

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
logged_in_from_new_device:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

We have noticed an unusual login into your {!! $login_appName !!} account from a device or IP you do not usually use.

Account: {!! $login_accountEmail !!}
Time: {!! $login_time !!}
IP Address: {!! $login_ipAddress !!}
Browser: {!! $login_browser !!}
Platform/OS: {!! $login_platform !!}
Device: {!! $login_device !!}

If this was you, you can ignore this alert. If you suspect any suspicious activity on your account, please change your password.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}

template_ticket_creation_acknowledgement:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Thank you for contacting us. This is to confirm that our agent has logged your request in our support system. When replying, please make sure that the ticket ID is kept in the subject so that we can track your replies.

Ticket ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}
Request message: {!! $message_content !!}

You can check the status of or update this ticket online at: {!! $system_link !!}

{!! $department_signature !!}

Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Thank you for contacting us. This is an automated response confirming the receipt of your ticket. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible. When replying, please make sure that the ticket ID is kept in the subject so that we can track your replies.

Ticket ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}

You can check the status of or update this ticket online at: {!! $system_link !!}

{!! $department_signature !!}

Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Our agent has created a new ticket for a request of your organization's member.

Ticket ID:  {!! $ticket_number !!}

Member's Details:
Name:  {!! $client_name !!}
E-mail: {!! $client_email !!}

Message:
{!! $message_content !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}

A new Contract {!! $contract_name !!} (#CNTR-{!! $contract_id !!}) has been submitted for your approval. Please verify the contract and confirm your approval.

Contract: {!! $contract_link !!}

Please click here to review the contract.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-contract-approved-by-agent-or-a:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Contract {!! $contract_name !!} (#CNTR-{!! $contract_id !!}) has been approved by {!! $approver_name !!}. You can go through the contract.

Contract: {!! $contract_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-contract-notify-agent-and-admin:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Contract {!! $contract_name !!} (#CNTR-{!! $contract_id !!}) will expire on {!! $contract_expiry !!}. You can go through the contract and take necessary actions.

Contract: {!! $contract_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-contract-rejected-by-agent-or-a:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Contract {!! $contract_name !!} (#CNTR-{!! $contract_id !!}) has been rejected by {!! $approver_name !!}.

Purpose of Rejection: {!! $contract_reason_rejection !!}

You can go through the contract and take necessary actions.

Contract: {!! $contract_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-internal-change-to-agent:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

This message is regarding a ticket with the ticket ID {!! $ticket_number !!}.
{!! $message_content !!}
By {!! $activity_by !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-internal-change-to-assigned-age:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

This message is regarding a ticket assigned to you with the ticket ID {!! $ticket_number !!}.
{!! $message_content !!}
By {!! $activity_by !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-invoice-to-clients:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

An invoice has generated for a ticket with ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}.

Ticket link: {!! $ticket_link_for_clients !!}
Total time spend: {!! $total_time !!} Hours
Cost: {!! $currency !!}{!! $cost !!}
Billing Date: {!! $bill_date !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-new-password:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Your password is successfully changed. Your new password is: {!! $user_password !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-new-ticket-creation-notice-agen:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

New ticket with ID: {!! $ticket_number !!} has been created in our helpdesk.

Client Details
Name: {!! $client_name !!}
E-mail: {!! $client_email !!}

Message
{!! $message_content !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-new-user-entry-notice:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

A new user has been registered in our helpdesk system.

User Details
Name: {!! $new_user_name !!}
Email: {!! $new_user_email !!}

You can check or update the user's complete profile by clicking the link below
{!! $user_profile_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-payment-approval:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

A user has purchased a package and selected offline payment method.

Order Details:

Invoice No: {!! $invoice_id !!}
Invoice Link: {!! $invoice_link_for_agent !!}
Client Name: {!! $invoice_user_name !!}
Amount Paid: {!! $invoice_amount_paid !!}
Paid Date: {!! $invoice_paid_date !!}
Payment Mode: {!! $invoice_payment_mode !!}
Package Name: {!! $package_name !!}
Package Validity: {!! $package_validity !!}
Package Expiry Date: {!! $order_expiry_date !!}
Package Credit Type: {!! $package_credit_type !!}

Please contact the user to verify payment details and confirm the order.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-purchase-confirmation:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Your recent purchase has been confirmed. You can use the purchased package for raising support tickets.

Order Details:

Invoice No: {!! $invoice_id !!}
Amount Paid: {!! $invoice_amount_paid !!}
Paid Date: {!! $invoice_paid_date !!}
Package Name: {!! $package_name !!}
Package Validity: {!! $package_validity !!}
Package Expiry Date: {!! $order_expiry_date !!}
Package Credit Type: {!! $package_credit_type !!}

Please find the attached invoice for your order.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-purchase-notification:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

An order of a user has been confirmed for a support package in the store. Below are the details of the order.

Order Details:

Invoice No: {!! $invoice_id !!}
Client Name: {!! $invoice_user_name !!}
Amount Paid: {!! $invoice_amount_paid !!}
Paid Date: {!! $invoice_paid_date !!}
Payment Mode: {!! $invoice_payment_mode !!}
Package Name: {!! $package_name !!}
Package Validity: {!! $package_validity !!}
Package Expiry Date: {!! $order_expiry_date !!}
Package Credit Type: {!! $package_credit_type !!}
Last Transaction Amount: {!! $last_transaction_amount !!}
Last Transaction Processed By: {!! $last_transaction_by_name !!}

Please find the attached invoice for more details about the order.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-rating-confirmation:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Overall rating has been submitted for a ticket {!! $ticket_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-rating-feedback:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

We hope you are happy with our support for the Ticket ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}

Please provide us with your valuable feedback for our service by clicking on a rating of your choice.

{!! $ratings_icon_with_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-register-confirmation-with-acco:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

This email is confirmation that you are now registered on {!! $system_name !!}.

Registered Email: {!! $new_user_email !!}
Password: {!! $user_password !!}

You can visit the helpdesk to browse articles and contact us at any time: {!! $system_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}

Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

This email is confirmation that you are now registered on {!! $system_name !!}.

Registered Email: {!! $new_user_email !!}
Password: {!! $user_password !!}

Please click on the below link to activate your account and Login to the system
{!! $account_activation_link !!}

You can visit the helpdesk to browse articles and contact us at any time: {!! $system_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-register-confirmation-with-acti:

Please click on the below link to verify your email address so you can use the system.
{!! $account_activation_link !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-report-export:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

{!! $report_type !!} is successfully generated and ready for download.

Please note this link will be expired in {!! $report_expiry !!}.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-reset-password-link:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

You asked to reset your password. To do so, please click this link:
{!! $password_reset_link !!}

This will let you change your password to something new. If you did not ask for this, do not worry, we will keep your password safe.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
template-resolve-time-approach-to-agents:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Ticket has not been resolved within the SLA time period. The ticket has to be resolved on or before {!! $ticket_due_date !!}.

Subject: {!! $ticket_subject !!}
Number: {!! $ticket_number !!}
Requester: {!! $client_name !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}

template-ticket-creation-acknowledgement:
Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Thank you for contacting us. This is to confirm that our agent has logged your request in our support system. When replying, please make sure that the ticket ID is kept in the subject so that we can track your replies.

Ticket ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}
Request message: {!! $message_content !!}

You can check the status of or update this ticket online at: {!! $system_link !!}

{!! $department_signature !!}

Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Thank you for contacting us. This is an automated response confirming the receipt of your ticket. Our team will get back to you as soon as possible. When replying, please make sure that the ticket ID is kept in the subject so that we can track your replies.

Ticket ID: {!! $ticket_number !!}

You can check the status of or update this ticket online at: {!! $system_link !!}

{!! $department_signature !!}

Hello {!! $receiver_name !!},

Our agent has created a new ticket for a request of your organization's member.

Ticket ID:  {!! $ticket_number !!}

Member's Details:
Name:  {!! $client_name !!}
E-mail: {!! $client_email !!}

Message:
{!! $message_content !!}

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}

A member of your organization has created a new ticket in our helpdesk system.

Kind Regards,
{!! $system_name !!}
